### Roc

_Dragon-sized hawks that nest in remote mountains._

**LV** 15, **AL** N
**AC** 15, **HP** 69, **MV** double near (fly)
**ATK** 4 rend +9 (2d10 + grab)

|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|

**Grab:** DC 18 STR or target held. DC 18 STR on turn to break free.
